summary: MY HUSBAND WAS DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY IN MY 2001 HONDA CIVIC.  THE CAR WAS STRUGGLING TO REACH 30 ALL OF A SUDDEN.  WE WERE ALMOST HIT FROM CARS COMING UP BEHIND.  HE SLOWED DOWN AND PULLED OVER TO THE SHOULDER ONLY TO FIND THAT THE CAR WOULD NO LONGER DRIVE WHEN HE PRESSED THE GAS.  THE TRANSMISSION HAD FAILED AND WE WERE LEFT ON THE SIDE OF THE ROAD.   NOT REPAIRED YET. *TR
